Title: Slow West
Genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Romance, Thriller, Western
Actors: Kodi Smit-McPhee, Caren Pistorius, Aorere Paki, Jeffrey Thomas
Plot: 'Slow West' follows a 16-year-old boy on a journey across 19th Century frontier America in search of the woman he loves, while accompanied by mysterious traveler Silas.
Production: DMC Film, Rachel Gardner Films, See-Saw Films
